WenQuanYi project intends to provide the open-source community with the most complete, standard compliant, high-quality Chinese fonts and resources. TrueType and bitmap fonts at various sizes/styles will be developed and freely available to users.
WenQuanYi Bitmap Song font for complete CJK Unified Ideographics, including 9, 10, 11 and 12 point. It provides medium and bold weight.
